titles.title: A bill to prohibit the duplication of benefits.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 10/7/1994--Introduced. Amends the Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Act, 1995 to limit certain disaster payments available to peanut producers.
